Title: Feels like a duplicate product of decathlon.
Content: For the first time felt like decathlon did a scam to me. Shoe came with no boxes even when you scan the product it doesn't shoe anything with it. Front side of one pair stich with glue. Its really a terrible experience. very disappointed. Even the in hand feel is terrible.
Brand Response: Hello Smitarini, Thank you for sharing your experience, and Iâ€™m really sorry to hear that youâ€™re dissatisfied with the shoes. We completely understand how frustrating it can be when a product doesnâ€™t meet your expectations, especially when you feel itâ€™s not up to the quality you expect.  We take product quality very seriously, and we regret that your pair arrived with issues like the lack of a box and glue-stitching on the front. This is definitely not the experience we want for our customers. Regarding the warranty, please note that it covers the sole pasting, but wear and tear due to usage, especially on the front toe stitching, would unfortunately fall outside of this coverage.  That said, we definitely want to make sure youâ€™re satisfied, so if thereâ€™s a defect or something specific thatâ€™s bothering you, weâ€™d love to look into it and help resolve the issue. If the product doesnâ€™t meet the standards you expect, please let us know, and we can discuss potential options.  Again, weâ€™re really sorry for the trouble this has caused, and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to address it. Please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out directly.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United

Title: Not Upto Mark
Content: I got pain in foot after using this shoe. It's not comfortable at all.
Brand Response: Hello S, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Weâ€™re truly sorry to hear that the womenâ€™s running shoes caused discomfort and pain in your foot. Thatâ€™s certainly not what we want anyone to go through, especially with footwear meant to support your movement.  To better understand what may have caused the issue, could you share a bit more about how the shoes felt while in use? For example, was it related to the arch, heel, or overall fit? Also, knowing how long you wore them and for what activity could help us assess the concern more clearly.  We aim to create running shoes that provide comfort, support, and performance, so feedback like yours is incredibly important in helping us improve. Every experience matters, and we're always working to better understand where things can be improved.  Thanks again for getting in touch. We appreciate your honesty and are here if you'd like to share any more details with us.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United
